name: Matteo Pradella
content: Matteo Pradella to {deib, ieiit} Matteo Pradella associate professor tel +39 02 2399 3495 fax +39 02 2399 3574 e-mail matteo.pradella @ polimi it where Italy, Milano, via Golgi 42, building 22, floor 3, room 37 twitter @bzoto A good traveller has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving - Lao Tzu Stolto Ã¨ il bighellone che si prefigge una meta - Altan research areas {software engineering, formal languages} stuff {face+bio, curriculum (eng), publications, TRIO homepage} software Zot: a Bounded Satisfiability Checker. Sat-Ts: a SAT-based parser, completer and generator for picture languages specified by tilings (new CNF version 20070225). Mazpa: parsing tools for some classes of 2D Context-free Grammars (presently, Kolam and Regional tile grammars). Flup: a simple tool for Operator Precedence Automata and Grammars. courses You can find all the materials of the courses Principles of Programming Languages, Theoretical Computer Science, and Algoritmi e Principi dell'Informatica/Informatica Teorica in WeBeep. theses You can look here for some ideas, but for up-to-date stuff please contact me.
